data_source: Directory of Open Access Repositories(OpenDOAR), Directory of Open Access Journals(DOAJ)
description: The first year the repository/journal becomes open access
Calculated by 1) counting the newly created open access repositories every year; 2) counting the cummulative sum of the existing open access repositories each year
Calculated by 1) counting the journals that start to offer open access content online every year; 2) counting the cummulative sum of the existing open access journals each year
